evidence.claim: Thrive Therapy uses AWS for their cloud infrastructure for scalability and data storage.
Documentation mentions compliance with HIPAA regulations, suggesting secure handling of health information.
Their platform integrates with EHRs through FHIR standards to exchange health data.
X12 EDI transaction sets are part of their data exchange process as noted in the technical specs.
The company mentions using RESTful APIs for integrating their services with third-party applications.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence found of X12 or EDI use cases relevant to API automation.
